title: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation process fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the open files being used are reported very late in the process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the JAR packager. 
2. Add some files to be included in the JAR. 
3. Press the 'Finish' button to start the JAR creation process. 
4. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
